5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to a man: ‘What do you say during your Salat?’ He said: ‘The Tashah-hud, then I ask Allah for Paradise, and I seek refuge with Him from Hell, but I do not understand what you and Mu’adh murmur (during Salat). He said: ‘Our murmuring revolves around the same things.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقَالُ فِي التَّشَهُّدِ وَالصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be said during the Tashah-hud and sending Salat upon the Prophet (ﷺ)
